column1: On [[2 January]] [[1917]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"
*'''Subject:''' Tolkien declares himself fit to report for duty.

column2:
Sir,
I have the honour to report myself for further orders.
My address on Jan 12th. 1917. will be at
185 Monument Road
Edgbaston
Birmingham

have the honour to be,
Sir,
Your obedient servant.

JRR Tolkien}}

column1: *"[http://www.nationalarchives.gov.uk/pathways/firstworldwar/people/p_tolkien_med.htm J R R Tolkien: trench fever]" at [http://www.nationalarchives.gov.uk NationalArchives.co.uk]
